first_translate: I can feel a great evil.
second_translate: I can definitely sense a great evil.

first_translate: it’s so terrifying that I can’t even look at it...!
second_translate: It's so terrifying, I can hardly bear to look at it...!

hangle: 그래도 피오나를 구할 수 있는 방법은 하나뿐이야.
first_translate: but there’s only one way to save fiona.
second_translate: But there's only one way to save Fiona.

first_translate: I’ll have to break through that darkness.
second_translate: I will break through that darkness.

first_translate: don’t you value your life, siegren?
second_translate: Don't you value your life, Siegren?

hangle: 저 어둠에 잠시 틈을 내는 것 정도는 할 수 있겠지?
first_translate: you can create a small gap in that darkness, right?
second_translate: You can create a small opening in that darkness, right?

first_translate: I’ll create a gap in the darkness!
second_translate: I'll create an opening in the darkness!

first_translate: why am I dressed like this...?

second_translate: How did things end up like this?

hangle: 분명 어둠에 있던 무언가를 상대하고 있었던 것 같은데.
first_translate: I was fighting something in the darkness.
second_translate: I'm sure I was fighting something that was in the darkness.

hangle: 왜 정신을 차리니 옷 벗은 너랑 누워 있는 거야.
first_translate: why am I lying next to you when you’re half-naked?
second_translate: Why is it that when I come to my senses, I'm lying next to you while you're undressed?

first_translate: I thought I had died and gone to heaven.
second_translate: I thought I had died and gone to heaven.

first_translate: after making everyone worry like that,
second_translate: After making everyone worry so much,
Is that really what you have to say...?!

first_translate: an emergency tent in the forest.
second_translate: A temporary camp set up in the forest.

hangle: 본부 쪽은 어둠이 와서 초토화가 되었으니까.
first_translate: the base was completely devastated by the darkness.
second_translate: Because the base was completely devastated by the darkness.

hangle: 네 몸이 너무 안 좋아서, 당장 영주의 성으로 이동할 수가 없었어.
first_translate: you were in such bad shape that we couldn’t take you to the lord’s castle right away.
second_translate: You were in such bad shape that we couldn't move you to the lord's castle immediately.

hangle: 다른 사람들은 모두 무사하니까 걱정하지 마.
first_translate: don’t worry. everyone else is safe.
second_translate: Don't worry, everyone else is safe.

first_translate: what are you doing? lie down and rest.
second_translate: What are you doing? Lie down and rest some more.

hangle: 날 구하기 위해서 다른 사람들이 얼마나 고생했을지,
first_translate: I want to find out how much trouble everyone went through to save me...
second_translate: I want to find out how much everyone struggled to save me...

hangle: 내가 어둠 속에서 본 게 뭔지…
first_translate: ...and what I saw in the darkness.
second_translate: …and what I saw in the darkness.

first_translate: I want to know right away.
second_translate: I want to go around and find out right away.
You must remain completely still for now.

hangle: 알고 있어. 실은 돌아다닐 힘도 없다고.
first_translate: I know. I don’t even have the strength to walk around.
second_translate: I know. Honestly, I don't even have the strength to move around.

hangle: 그래도 꼭 하고 싶은 게 하나 있어.
first_translate: but there’s one thing I want to do.
second_translate: But there's still one thing I really want to do.

first_translate: it looked like you were crying.
second_translate: It seemed like you were crying.

first_translate: it reminds me of the past.
second_translate: It reminds me of the old days.

first_translate: I feel like I’m going to go crazy because of you...
a city near the affected area.
second_translate: A city near the disaster zone.

first_translate: I was so worried that something bad had happened to you.
second_translate: I was really worried that something might go wrong.

first_translate: you were in a coma, and your body temperature was low.
second_translate: You were in a coma, and your body temperature was low as well.
As long as I'm safe, that's what matters.

first_translate: do you think his grace and prince siegren will think the same?
second_translate: Do you think His Grace and Prince Siegren would agree?

hangle: 주군께 감히 비밀을 만들 수는 없죠.
first_translate: I can’t keep secrets from my master.
second_translate: I cannot dare to keep secrets from my lord.

hangle: 그 후에 다른 사람들에게 감사 인사를 잔뜩 받았다.
first_translate: I received a lot of thanks from other people after that.
second_translate: After that, I received many words of gratitude from others.

hangle: 아카데미 연구원들은 물론이고, 엑스트라 기사들도 날 찾아왔었지.
first_translate: not only the academy researchers, but even the extra knights came to see me.
second_translate: Not only the academy researchers, but even the extra knights sought me out.

hangle: 영지의 주인인 렐턴 후작도 우리를 환대하며
first_translate: marquess relton, the owner of the land, also welcomed us...
second_translate: Marquess Relton, the lord of the territory, also welcomed us...

hangle: 이번 일로 유니스의 힘에 가능성이 있다는 것도 확인했으니,
first_translate: we also confirmed that eunice’s powers have potential,
second_translate: We also confirmed that Eunice's powers hold potential through this incident.

hangle: 일이 꽤 잘 풀렸다 할 수 있겠어.
first_translate: so I can say that things worked out quite well.
second_translate: I can say that things worked out quite well.

first_translate: on the way to the marquess’s manor
second_translate: On the way to the marquis's manor

first_translate: there are still many unresolved mysteries...
second_translate: There are still several unresolved mysteries...

hangle: 어둠 속의 그 사람은 대체 누구일까?
first_translate: who was that person in the darkness?
second_translate: Who was that person in the darkness?
Does the darkness create hallucinations too...?

first_translate: I just can’t seem to find an answer.
second_translate: I just can't seem to find an answer.

first_translate: right before I was sucked into the darkness,
second_translate: Right before being sucked into the darkness,

first_translate: it was just for a moment,
second_translate: It was only for a brief moment,

first_translate: but I was able to stop the darkness from coming.
second_translate: I was able to stop the darkness from approaching, even if only for a moment.
Could I possibly control the darkness?
